attributes.action: To ask Westminster council to scrap the charges for motorcycles to park in their borough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an unfair tax and clearly not well thought out. It is an irresponsible reacton to people moving from cars to motorcycles as a cheaper and quicker and LESS congestive form of transport. The council obviously reacted to having to increase the number of spaces by charging which is counter productive to reducing the congestion in london. They should be promoting motorcycling not discouraging it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To ask Westminster council to scrap the charges for motorcycles to park in their borough."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18842


Prime Minister's Office
